full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 10kg Pair (2 x 10kg) Hexagon Hand Weights with Color Coded Non-Slip Grip, Cast Iron Core Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

reasoning.keyword_integration: Integrated top keywords 'dumbbells set', 'dumbbells', 'weights dumbbells set', 'dumbbells set women', and 'weights for women' by structuring the title around these phrases. Used 'hand weights' and 'home gym equipment' as secondary keywords. The description flows naturally by connecting features (hexagon shape, non-slip grip) with use cases (home gym, fitness training) for a broad audience.
